[http://code.google.com/p/flightschool/ FlightSchool] is an open-source web application aimed at flight schools and air clubs, providing a complete online scheduling, accounting system, content-management and online community solution. The application was originially developed as a project for [http://philip.greenspun.com/teaching/6171/2006-spring Software Engineering for Internet Applications] class at [http://web.mit.edu MIT], taught by [http://philip.greenspun.com/ Philip Greenspun], and is currently being used by [http://ecacbed.com East Coast Aero Club]. The full overview of the system is available [http://flightschool.googlecode.com/files/FlightSchool.pdf here].
